{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3274364,"name":"hazel","username":"lacedwithennui","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/34f0e0/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-06T20:51:38.361Z","cooked":"

Is there any sort of timeline or information on when the 2024/Crescendo AprilTag map will be released? The 2023/ChargedUp version is here, and I know the season is very young, but I can’t find a 2024 one yet. Will it be released with the kickoff release of WPILib 2024, or sometime later?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-01-06T20:51:38.361Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":8413,"reads":1265,"readers_count":1264,"score":42378.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":447874,"topic_slug":"crescendo-apriltag-map","display_username":"hazel","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://docs.limelightvision.io/docs/docs-limelight/pipeline-apriltag/apriltag-map-specification","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"AprilTag Map Specification | Limelight Documentation","clicks":684}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":58470,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/crescendo-apriltag-map/447874/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"question","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3274413,"name":"Joe Ross","username":"Joe_Ross","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/joe_ross/{size}/37_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-06T21:11:08.950Z","cooked":"

Are you specifically asking about the one for the Limelight? What’s included in WPILib is a different format.

The locations are in the layout / marking diagram

firstfrc.blob.core.windows.net

2024LayoutMarkingDiagram.pdf

2.43 MB

I tried to play with the Map Builder for a bit and it makes an fmap file with 16h5 family april tags. No option for 36h11.

The following FMAP files works on my limelight. I manually changed the tag type to 36h11. You can copy the text into a text file and save it with a .fmap extension. The field image is old, but all the tags are in the correct spot and tracking. I tested with one of the vision sample images

image1881×935 91.3 KB

fmap
